name: tiles
generator_options: tippecanoe --force -zg --coalesce-densest-as-needed --extend-zooms-if-still-dropping ./data/countries.geojson -o ./data/countries.mbtiles; tippecanoe --force -r1 '--cluster-distance=1' ./data/places.geojson -o ./data/places.mbtiles; tile-join --force -e ./example/tiles -n tiles -N 'Natural Earth Vector Tile' --no-tile-compression ./data/countries.mbtiles ./data/places.mbtiles
